short.ru: Облачный сервис для автоматического распознавания капч

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CAPTCHA SOLVING SERVICE
Automate your apps with our fast and cheap API

Online service for automated captcha solving
With this extension, you can recognize reCAPTCHA, hCaptcha and other types of captchas automatically.

The extension is designed to work in Google Chrome.

How to start using the Capkill chrome extension:
1. Add an extension to your browser
2. Register an account here https://capkill.com
3. Recharge your account
4. Enter the API key provided in your capkill account
5. Hola, Now you can start using captcha services
